msg: OAK-1989 Query: improved performance for queries with many literals

author: kwall
msg: QPID-5918: [Java Broker] Use the interpolation of file.separator to build paths within Broker's initial-config

author: kwright
msg: Add some protection against poorly coded transformation connectors.  addOrReplaceDocument signals now must make it through the pipeline, or the framework will issue a noDocument() invocation itself.
